title: Vacation Rental Dashboard
subtitle: Manage your vacation rental cases, promotions and subscription

casesTab.noCasesDescription: You haven't created any Vacation Rental Cases yet. Create your first case through the admin area.

promotionTab.noQRCodesDescription: Create some vacation rental cases first to generate QR codes for promotion.
promotionTab.flyerDescription: Download a pre-made flyer with QR code that you can print and distribute.
promotionTab.printTemplateDescription: Download an A4 print template with 5 flyers ready to cut out.

subscriptionTab.title: Subscription
subscriptionTab.description: Manage your subscription and billing information here.

form.title: Create Your Vacation Rental Case
form.description: Fill out the form below to create a unique crime case for your vacation rental. Upon completing the free 7-day trial subscription, the creation of your individual detective case will begin. The generation takes up to 24 hours. You will be notified by email once your case is ready. Afterwards, you can generate QR codes that your guests can scan to play the case.

venueDescription.label: Venue Description
venueDescription.helpText: Describe architecture, interior style, and special features

maxGuests.label: Maximum Number of Guests
maxGuests.required: Maximum number of guests is required

roomLayoutDescription.label: Room Layout (optional)
roomLayoutDescription.helpText: Describe the room layout across all floors

addCaseCard.title: Create Your Vacation Rental Case
addCaseCard.description: Create a new vacation rental case

generatingCard.title: Case Being Created
generatingCard.description: Generating your vacation rental case... This usually takes up to 24 hours.
generatingCard.paymentDescription: To start generating your unique detective case, please complete the subscription first.

duration.title: Generation Time: Up to 24 Hours
duration.description: The AI-powered creation of your unique crime case typically takes up to 24 hours.

notification.title: Email Notification
notification.description: You will receive an email notification once your case is fully generated and available for your guests.

qrCode.title: QR Code Download
qrCode.description: After publication, you can download the QR code for your case in the 'Promotion' tab and distribute it to your guests.

messages.noUsername: Username not available. Please log in again.

autosave.restored: Your previously entered data has been restored.
